settings.destini_intro_text:
Enter your zip code to find Richard’s Rainwater in over 2,000 grocery stores!

Prefer Grocery Delivery? Click the “Buy Online” button.

settings.aisle_heading: Can we buy you a drink?
settings.aisle_intro_text: Enter your phone number, purchase a single bottle or can of Richard’s at your local retailer and we’ll Venmo or Paypal you back for the cost of one.
